empty_title.title: Er is hier niets te zien!
empty_title.note: Text shown where there are no remaining history entries

empty_text.title: Nog geen surfgeschiedenis.
empty_text.note: Placeholder text when there's no results to show

no_results_title.title: Geen resultaten gevonden voor {term}
no_results_title.note: The placeholder {term} will be dynamically replaced with the search term entered by the user. For example, if the user searches for 'cats', the title will become 'No results found for cats'.

no_results_text.title: Probeer te zoeken naar een andere URL of trefwoorden.
no_results_text.note: Placeholder text when a search gave no results.

delete_all.title: Alles verwijderen
delete_all.note: Text for a button that deletes all items or entries. An additional confirmation dialog will be presented.

delete_some.title: Verwijderen
delete_some.note: Text for a button that deletes currently selected items

delete_none.title: Er is niets om te verwijderen
delete_none.note: Title/tooltip text on a button that does nothing when there is no browsing history to delete. It's additional information shown on hover.

search.title: Zoeken
search.note: The placeholder text in a search input field.

show_history_all.title: Alle geschiedenis tonen
show_history_all.note: Button text for an action that removes all filters and searches, and replaces the list with all history.

show_history_older.title: Oudere geschiedenis tonen
show_history_older.note: Button that shows older history entries

show_history_for.title: Geschiedenis weergeven voor {range}
show_history_for.note: The placeholder {range} in the title will be dynamically replaced with specific date ranges such as 'Today', 'Yesterday', or days of the week like 'Monday'. For example, if the range is set to 'Today', the title will become 'Show history for Today'.

delete_history_all.title: Alle geschiedenis verwijderen
delete_history_all.note: Button text for an action that removes all history entries.

delete_history_older.title: Oudere geschiedenis verwijderen
delete_history_older.note: Button that deletes older history entries.

delete_history_for.title: Geschiedenis verwijderen voor {range}
delete_history_for.note: The placeholder {range} in the title will be dynamically replaced with specific date ranges such as 'Today', 'Yesterday', or days of the week like 'Monday'. For example, if the range is set to 'Today', the title will become 'Delete history for Today'.

search_your_history.title: Zoek in je geschiedenis
search_your_history.note: Label text for screen readers. It's shown next to the search input field

range_all.title: Alle
range_all.note: Label on a button that shows all history entries

range_today.title: Vandaag
range_today.note: Label on a button that shows history entries for today only

range_yesterday.title: Gisteren
range_yesterday.note: Label on a button that shows history entries for yesterday only

range_monday.title: maandag
range_monday.note: Label on a button that shows history entries for monday only

range_tuesday.title: dinsdag
range_tuesday.note: Label on a button that shows history entries for tuesday only

range_wednesday.title: woensdag
range_wednesday.note: Label on a button that shows history entries for wednesday only

range_thursday.title: donderdag
range_thursday.note: Label on a button that shows history entries for thursday only

range_friday.title: vrijdag
range_friday.note: Label on a button that shows history entries for friday only

range_saturday.title: zaterdag
range_saturday.note: Label on a button that shows history entries for saturday only

range_sunday.title: zondag
range_sunday.note: Label on a button that shows history entries for sunday only

range_older.title: Ouder
range_older.note: Label on a button that shows older history entries.
